element.name: Display
element.description: This element holds system-wide settings for colors, fonts, etc.

property.name: rwt-shadow-color
property.description: Color used to draw (outer) shadow line in 3d borders. Defines the value of SWT#COLOR_WIDGET_NORMAL_SHADOW.

property.name: rwt-highlight-color
property.description: Color used to draw (outer) highlight line in 3d borders. Defines the value of SWT#COLOR_WIDGET_HIGHLIGHT_SHADOW.

property.name: rwt-darkshadow-color
property.description: Color used to draw (inner) shadow line in 3d borders. Defines the value of SWT#COLOR_WIDGET_DARK_SHADOW.

property.name: rwt-lightshadow-color
property.description: Color used to draw (inner) highlight line in 3d borders. Defines the value of SWT#COLOR_WIDGET_LIGHT_SHADOW.

property.name: rwt-thinborder-color
property.description: Color for thin lines as shown by Group, TabFolder headers, Table headers, etc. Defines the value of SWT#COLOR_WIDGET_BORDER.

property.name: rwt-selectionmarker-color
property.description: Color used to mark selected items like TreeColumns and TabViews.

property.name: rwt-infobackground-color
property.description: Color used by PopupDialog for its background. Defines the value of SWT#COLOR_INFO_BACKGROUND.

property.name: rwt-error-image
property.description: The image used for MessageBoxes with style SWT#ICON_ERROR. Also returned by Display#getSystemImage().

property.name: rwt-information-image
property.description: The image used for MessageBoxes with style SWT#ICON_INFORMATION. Also returned by Display#getSystemImage().

property.name: rwt-working-image
property.description: The image used for MessageBoxes with style SWT#ICON_WORKING. Also returned by Display#getSystemImage().

property.name: rwt-question-image
property.description: The image used for MessageBoxes with style SWT#ICON_QUESTION. Also returned by Display#getSystemImage().

property.name: rwt-warning-image
property.description: The image used for MessageBoxes with style SWT#ICON_WARNING. Also returned by Display#getSystemImage().

property.name: rwt-fontlist
property.description: The font list returned by Display#getFontList().

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image for the display (client area of the browser window).

property.name: font
property.description: The default system font. Returned by Display#getSystemFont().

element.name: Widget-Badge
element.description: Badges on SWT widgets, as set using setData( RWT.BADGE, ... ).

property.name: color
property.description: Text color for badges.

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color for badges.

property.name: border
property.description: The outer border that is drawn around badges.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for badges.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for badges.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for badges.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for badges.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: font
property.description: Text font for badges.

element.name: Widget-ToolTip
element.description: Tooltips on SWT widgets, as set using setTooltipText().

property.name: color
property.description: Text color for tooltips.

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color for tooltips.

property.name: border
property.description: The outer border that is drawn around tooltips.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for tooltips.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for tooltips.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for tooltips.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for tooltips.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image or gradient for tooltips.

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding around the tooltips text.

property.name: font
property.description: Text font for tooltips.

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the tooltip. A value between 0 and 1.

property.name: animation
property.description: Supports animations-types "fadeIn" and "fadeOut". Others are ignored.

property.name: box-shadow
property.description: The shadow behind the tooltip.

property.name: text-align
property.description: The tooltip text alignment.

element.name: Widget-ToolTip-Pointer
element.description: A pointer attached outside a tooltip to point towards the widget it belongs to. Not supported in Internet Explorer 8 or lower.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image used to display the pointer.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image positioned in the center of the overlay

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color of the overlay. Supports rgba values.
